subhead: On September 8, the young social worker was stabbed to death by her former partner. Despite five warnings and court-ordered surveillance, her attacker was never taken into custody, and he is still on the run today.

headline: Historian Tal Bruttmann's sharp eye on the Holocaust
subhead: In his latest book, the French historian continues his investigation into the photographs taken by the SS in 1944 at Auschwitz ‚Äì archives that had never been used before ‚Äì and tirelessly challenges misconceptions about the Holocaust.

headline: France's situation causes concern in Brussels
subhead: The country's political instability, the rise of the far right and deteriorating public finances are worrying its European partners. The appointment of PM S√©bastien Lecornu, who has so far not been very involved in EU affairs, has done little to reassure them.
